entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F813,0,16003}All prentices, this is Hope speaking.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,16004}Your training session has come to{F801}an end.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F813,0,16003}Todos os aprendizes, aqui eh Hope falando.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,16004}Sua secao de treinamento chegou{F801}ao fim.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,16005}It would seem someone has beaten me{F801}to the finish line.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,16005}Parece que alguem me derrotou em alcancar{F801}a linha de chegada.{F801}
